header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_StructuredProxyPushSupplier

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::StructuredProxyPushSupplier interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_structured_push_consumer(StructuredProxyPushSupplier, PushConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a consumer to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PushConsumer to the target object. If a connection already exists or the function push_structured_event is not supported by the client object an exception is raised.

func.name: suspend_connection(StructuredProxyPushSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Suspend the connection with the target object

desc.p: This operation suspends the connection with the target object. If no connection exists or the connection already is suspended an exception is raised.
If the connection with the target object have been suspended this function must be used to resume the connection. If no client have been connected or the connection is active an exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_structured_push_supplier(StructuredProxyPushSupplier) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the target object

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
